name: com.s8l.vr
description:
Base setup and utilities for VR based on VRTK

1.7.17: Fixed hairline support.

1.7.16: Added Open XR Support, removed Windows MR.

1.7.15: Added Trigger Hairline support

1.7.12: Added Windows MR Support

1.7.8: Added the DDOL lookup in VRTK_SharedMethods

1.7.7: Fixed EventSystem bug introduced by [DisallowMultipleComponent]

1.7.1: Needs 2020.3.17 LTS Version - Updated usage for index touch to use Oculus Usage, Updated deps

1.6.1: Fixed the XR Enabled error prompt.

1.6.0: Split VR Lib into barebones functionality and pretty package

1.5.0: Added HTC Vive Focus Plus Support

1.4.8 : Tracer settings

1.4.7 : Added custom tracers to pointer

1.4.6 : Set tracking origin to floor

1.4.1 : Added support for Pico Neo 2, also downgraded to the latest supported version (2020.1.17f1)

1.4.0 : Using XR Subsystems

1.3.2 : Added TrackingSpaceTracker

1.3.0 : Added PlayerSetup support

1.2.0 : Added hands

1.1.3 : Option to set layers for VRTK pointer renderers 

1.1.0 : IMPORTANT - Updated Oculus Integration
